name: Your Personality Name
description: Brief description of what this personality is like
system_prompt: This is the main prompt that defines how the AI behaves. Be very detailed here - describe their personality, how they speak, what they care about, how they interact with others, their goals, beliefs, quirks, etc. This is the most important field - make it comprehensive and specific.

language.preference: Describe how this personality speaks - formal/casual, uses slang, technical terms, etc.

cultural_context.communication_style: Detailed description of how they communicate - tone, formality, directness, use of humor, etc.
cultural_context.greeting_style: How they typically greet people - formal, casual, aggressive, friendly, etc.
cultural_context.emoji_usage: How they use emojis - frequently, rarely, never, specific types, etc.

examples.greeting: An example of how they would greet someone
examples.response_style: An example of how they would respond to a typical question or statement
